metadata.title: CVE-2016-3844 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: mediaserver in Android before 2016-08-05 on Nexus 9 and Pixel C devicesallows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internalbug 28299517.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
